contents.item: When we allow people to fellowship with us, God welcomes us into fellowshipping with Him
You values are your life’s worth
Celebrate people irrespective of their status or position
Your calling is your destiny
When we allow people to come into our environment, God gives us His environment
When you celebrate a person, you are celebrating the creator of that person
We are carriers of God
The ability to be intense in whatever you do is a key factor in reclaiming your lost years
It is impossible to pause, stop or delay time
Life is given for increase
Don’t go in the opposite direction, locate your calling
If your idea is not against your conscience or the will of God, go for it
Look for people around you and serve them with love and compassion
We glorify God when we encourage and bless His creation
Life is given for increase and multiplication of the glory of God
Life is given to be invested in multiplying
Celebrating people is a form of love
Don’t equate effective living to being busy
Your destiny is connected with your calling
If you are not living in active consciousness, you will always be lost
You only gain in life when you multiply
You have to discover your area of talent to be effective
All products are a multiplication of time invested
Speed is the ability to take a decision in a few seconds
Don’t invest everything in another man’s calling
All you do out of selfish reasons is a waste
You need to live a life of service to make your life an effective one
Let your neighbor’s needs be your concern
The effectiveness of your life is determined by how much impact you make
God can only relate effectively with you when you relate with people
Don’t exert all your energy on employment, locate your purpose
We celebrate God when we share in each other’s joy and pain
Always celebrate people for who they are
We reject God when we reject people
You need to understand the principle of intensity to reclaim time
Man’s inner content is the worth of his life
Your calling is whatever motivates you more than money
The best way to appreciate God is to appreciate His creation
The principle of God is love
Money does not determine our worth
It is only when you trust in God that you can make it life
Life is not about longevity but about effectiveness
Stop trying to make a living and begin to live
Your calling is in what you can do without noticing time
You must be a servant if you want to be great in life
The service to God is our service to humanity
We should be blessings to others as believers
Everything in existence was gotten from the currency of time
Serving people is more important to God than the religious activities we engage in
Always be organized in adding value
True service is when you serve others without expecting anything in return
Life is about fruitfulness
Greatness is an attainment bought with the currency of time
You have to lift a person up before you can really put them in their place.
You cannot understand God without understanding people
Reflect and meditate on yourself and discover ways to multiply yourself
You cannot find God without finding people
Your time is the life you have at a particular moment
Service to humanity is the key to gaining the Kingdom of God
Nothing exists in isolation there is a purpose for everything
Be eager to explore new discoveries
Always live in active consciousness
Appreciate and find ways to invest in yourself
Love others the way God loves you
Time is wasted when it is not being converted
We disqualify ourselves from communicating with God when we refuse to open our hearts to people
Effectiveness of life should be measured by the results in the area of your calling or purpose
The effectiveness of your life is not determined by the duration of your life
You cannot appreciate God without appreciating people
We should see our calling as our life’s major assignment
Service to humanity has no alternative
The nature of God is that we welcome and celebrate one another
Things done for self don’t count in living an effective life
Love is about self-denial
An effective life is a fulfilled one
To live an effective life, you must understand the essence and secret of life
Every fragment of time that passes daily must be converted for it to be fully effective
A selfish living is a wasteful living
Use your knowledge and physical strength. You have the opportunity today, start living for Him
All products come from the worth of time
Life shouldn’t be about survival alone but about living
Reconsider your life and see how you can make things work for yourself
The totality of your commitment will make you more efficient
You need to do an inventory of yourself to discover your calling and purpose
You love God by showing love to His creations
See the light in losing your employment
You can only see God when you notice people
You only work right when you are fulfilling the essence of your creation
The world system is employment
Your relationship with God is tested by your relationship with His people
